title: Education and Learning
body:
When facilitating a training session, the Trainer’s responsibility is to ensure that learners acquire the knowledge and skills required to perform the task. As a Trainer, you should understand your participants and prepare engaging training strategies to hone your learners’ skills.

Select View to explore each chapter.

Note: Each chapter contains a few offline tasks. Use 'Your Task Sheet' template provided in the Resources section to complete these tasks.
